software.amazon.smithy.build

Interface ProjectionTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Apply, ConfigurableProjectionTransformer, ExcludeMetadata, ExcludeShapesByTag, ExcludeTags, ExcludeTraits, ExcludeTraitsByTag, IncludeMetadata, IncludeNamespaces, IncludeServices, IncludeShapesByTag, IncludeTags, IncludeTraits, IncludeTraitsByTag, RemoveUnusedShapes

    public interface ProjectionTransformer
    Creates a model transformer by name.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the transformer.
        Returns:
        Returns the name (e.g., "traits").

        Model transform(TransformContext context)
        Transforms the given model using the provided TransformContext.
        Parameters:
        context - Transformation context.
        Returns:
        Returns the created transformer.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the arguments are invalid.
